import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { return (

Find E-Waste Recycling Facilities Near You

Help protect the environment by properly disposing of your electronic waste

Find Facilities

Why Recycle E-Waste?

Environmental Protection

Prevent harmful chemicals from entering our soil and water systems

Resource Recovery

Valuable materials can be recovered and reused in new products

Legal Compliance

Proper disposal helps you comply with environmental regulations

How It Works

1

Search

Enter your location to find nearby e-waste facilities

2

Filter

Filter facilities by type of e-waste accepted and distance

3

Visit

Get directions and visit the facility to recycle your e-waste

); }; export default Home;
